meta.title: Privacy Policy | Produkt Auto
meta.description: Learn how Produkt Auto protects your personal data. GDPR compliance and data security.

privacy.pageDescription: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your data.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content:
We only collect data necessary for providing our services. This includes:

• Full name
• Email address
• Phone number
• Information about vehicles you're interested in

All data is collected only with your consent and used solely for its intended purpose.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content:
Your personal data is protected with the latest security measures:

• SSL encryption for all communications
• Secure data storage
• Limited access only to authorized personnel
• Regular security audits and updates

We never share your data with third parties without your explicit consent.

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.content:
Our website uses cookies to provide you with the best user experience:

• Essential cookies - for basic site functionality
• Analytics cookies - to understand how you use the site
• Functional cookies - to remember your preferences

You can control cookies through your browser settings.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content:
Under GDPR, you have the following rights:

• Right to access your personal data
• Right to rectify inaccurate data
• Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")
• Right to restrict processing
• Right to data portability
• Right to object

To exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

contact.title: Privacy Contact
contact.description: For all questions regarding privacy and data protection, contact us:

meta.title: Terms of Use | Produkt Auto
meta.description: Read the terms of use for Produkt Auto website. Information about vehicle purchases, warranty, and payment.

terms.pageDescription: Please read these terms carefully before using our website and services.

general.title: 1. General Terms
general.content:
By using the Produkt Auto j.d.o.o. website, you accept these terms of use. Please read them carefully before using our services.

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the site after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

vehicleInfo.title: 2. Vehicle Information
vehicleInfo.content:
All vehicle information on our site is provided in good faith and to the best of our knowledge:

• Vehicle photos are real and current
• Specifications and equipment are verified before publication
• Prices are in euros (€) and include VAT
• Vehicle availability is subject to change

We recommend personal inspection of vehicles before purchase.

pricing.title: 3. Prices and Payment
pricing.content:
All prices on the site are for informational purposes:

• Final price is determined by the sales contract
• Vehicle reservation is possible with a deposit
• We accept cash, card, and bank transfer payments
• Financing available through leasing companies

For detailed payment information, contact our sales team.

warranty.title: 4. Warranty and Claims
warranty.content:
All vehicles sold through our company come with:

• Verified vehicle history
• Engine and transmission warranty (depending on vehicle)
• Extended warranty options
• 14-day return right for consumers

Claims are accepted in writing within the legal period.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.content:
Produkt Auto j.d.o.o. is not liable for:

• Typographical errors on the site
• Temporary unavailability of the site
• Damages resulting from use of site information
• Decisions made based on site information

We strive to maintain accuracy of all information, but recommend verification before purchase.

disputes.title: 6. Dispute Resolution
disputes.content:
In case of dispute:

• We first attempt amicable resolution
• Croatian law applies
• The court in Zagreb has jurisdiction
• Consumers may use alternative dispute resolution

questions.title: Have Questions?
questions.description: For any questions regarding terms of use, feel free to contact us.
